name: Grozs Fantasy World
description:
"Grozs Fantasy World"


A action adventure game where players take on the role of adventurers traversing various fantasy-themed worlds.

Game features:


- Unique Pixel Style: The game utilizes unique pixel art to present a fantasy world full of colorful characters.
- Diverse Enemies and Battle of Bosses: Players will encounter various Characters with their unique features and Battle of Bosses that present different challenges.
- Select among Multiple Weapons: The game supports three types of weapons, and players can choose the favorite weapon to play.
- Friendly Platform Jumping: The game designs for a simple gameplay and easy to begin. Players can use jumping, sprinting, etc. to achieve easy and smooth platform jumping.

Developer's words:


Welcome to "Grozs Fantasy World", a game I developed independently. Except for the audio, all content is independently designed. As a new developer, I have not considered many aspects, and I hope everyone will understand. If you are interested in this game, please support it. If this game has caused you trouble, you can refund it or contact me by email to get more information.
